dcterms:creator: Benson Chen
Tianxiao Shen
Tommi S. Jaakkola
Regina Barzilay
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset containing 50,000 chemical reactions extracted from United States patent literature, used for evaluating retrosynthesis prediction models. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets, with each reaction represented as SMILES strings.
dcterms:title: USPTO-50k
